label: 室町殿袖判口宣案
ローマ字1_mod: Muromachi dono Sode han Kuzen an
見出し読み: むろまちどのそではんくぜんあん
見出し読み_mod: むろまちどのそではんくぜんあん
説明文: Those termed Sode-han Kuzen-an of the Muromachi Lord" are kuzen-an to which a Muromachi shogun had affixed his cipher (han) in the margin (sode), and constitute a genre of document known only in the Muromachi era.#[article]Kinoshita Satoshi. On the Kuzen-an of the Muromachi Lord."
